content.body: Hi all! Can someone help me?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Hi all! Can someone help me?

content.body: I have a question, if anyone can answer I would be happy
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I have a question, if anyone can answer I would be happy

content.body: I would like to know if we could create a library in javascript to generate user interaction data
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: I would like to know if we could create a library in javascript to generate user interaction data

content.body: This would be an alternative to cookies etc.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: This would be an alternative to cookies etc.

content.body: This can be interesting for data analysis etc
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: This can be interesting for data analysis etc

content.body: I would like to know if this idea is good or bad, I want to hear all sides, all criticisms, everything that can be improved or corrected
